ModInfo.description:
Exposes game state data via TCP and HTTP APIs, enabling companion apps, overlays, and external tools to read live game information.
Connection Options: - TCP (port 9876): Persistent connection that receives push notifications on game events - HTTP (port 9877): REST API for on-demand queries (GET /state, /players, /cities, /characters, /character-events, /tribes)
Data Exposed: - Players: Nation, stockpiles, yield rates, legitimacy, city/unit counts - Cities: Yields, improvements, build queues, religion, culture, happiness, governor, family - Characters: 75+ fields including traits, ratings, jobs, spouses, children, opinions, relationships, lifecycle timeline - Character Events: Births, deaths, marriages, leader changes, heir changes (detected between turns) - Diplomacy: Team relationships, war states, war scores, alliances, contact status - Tribes: Strength, cities, settlements, diplomacy with players, alliances
Source code: https://github.com/becked/OldWorldAPIEndpoint
ModInfo.author: becked
